Key Match Events: Detroit scored the first five points of the second half
Detroit took a 79-78 lead on a Hardaway 3-pointer with 3:25 remaining in the quarter
Detroit finished the third on a 5-1 spurt
A Bridges turnover led to a Harris fast break layup
Cunningham hit a midrange jumper for a 94-90 lead with 3:10 left
Miscellaneous Highlights: Detroit was playing its first game since starting guard Jaden Ivey suffered a fractured left fibula against the Orlando Magic on Wednesday
Others: Cade Cunningham supplied 18 points for Detroit
Malik Beasley had 12 points off the bench
Miles Bridges led Charlotte with 20 points, nine rebounds and five assists
Mark Williams had 18 points and nine rebounds for the Hornets
